name: 李春穎
objective: 先修課程：負責教授同意。1.應力、應變、能量、及失效。2.厚壁圓筒。3.圓盤對稱彎曲。4.撓曲、反力、及能量法。5.扭轉。6.非對稱彎曲、剪力中心、及薄壁梁。7.曲梁。8.塑性崩潰、及極限分析。9.梁-柱、挫曲、及非線性。
schedule:
週次           教學內容
  1, 2       Column, Elastic stability
  3,4,5      Analysis of Stresses
  6          Mid-term exam# 1
  7,8        Analysis of strains
  9	    Stress-strain relations
  10,11	    Energy methods
  12         Mid-term exam# 2
  13,14	    Bending of beams and curved beams
  15,16	    Torsion
  17	    Axisymmetric problems
  18	    Final exam
scorePolicy:
1 出缺席考核與課堂行為表現 (10%)
2 期中考(30%)x2
3 期末考(30%)
materials:
1. Advanced Mechanics of Solids, by L.S. Srinath, 1980, Tata McGraw-Hill Pub.
2. Mechanics of Materials, by Beer, Johnston & Dewolf, 3rd ed. in SI units, McGraw-Hill Pub. 
3. Mechanics of Materials, by J. M. Gere, 2001, Brooks/Cole Pub.
